// Definir métricas a monitorar com thresholds dinâmicos
const metrics = [
  {
    name: 'database_health',
    query: 'SELECT 1 as health',
    type: 'postgres',
    threshold: null,
    critical: true,
    description: 'Verificar conexão com PostgreSQL'
  },
  {
    name: 'redis_health',
    command: 'PING',
    type: 'redis',
    expected: 'PONG',
    critical: true,
    description: 'Verificar conexão com Redis'
  },
  {
    name: 'data_freshness',
    query: `
      SELECT 
        dataset_id, 
        MAX(period_start) as last_update,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - MAX(period_start)))/3600 as hours_since_update
      FROM data_records
      WHERE dataset_id IN ('carga_energia', 'cmo_pld', 'bandeiras_tarifarias')
      GROUP BY dataset_id
    `,
    type: 'postgres',
    threshold: 24,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Verificar atualização dos dados críticos'
  },
  {
    name: 'error_rate',
    query: `
      SELECT 
        COUNT(*) as error_count,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN 1 END) as recent_errors,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = 'critical' THEN 1 END) as critical_errors
      FROM error_logs
      WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
    `,
    type: 'postgres',
    threshold: 100,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Taxa de erros do sistema'
  },
  {
    name: 'api_response_time',
    url: 'http://localhost:8501/api/health',
    type: 'http',
    timeout: 5000,
    threshold: 3000,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Tempo de resposta da API'
  },
  {
    name: 'disk_usage',
    query: `
      SELECT 
        pg_database_size('aide_db')/1024/1024 as size_mb,
        pg_database_size('aide_db')/1024/1024/1024 as size_gb,
        (pg_database_size('aide_db')::float / 
         pg_settings.setting::bigint)::float * 100 as usage_percent
      FROM pg_settings
      WHERE name = 'shared_buffers'
    `,
    type: 'postgres',
    threshold: 10000,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Uso de disco do banco de dados'
  },
  {
    name: 'active_sessions',
    command: `EVAL "return #redis.call('KEYS', 'session:*')" 0`,
    type: 'redis',
    threshold: 1000,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Sessões ativas no sistema'
  },
  {
    name: 'ingestion_status',
    query: `
      SELECT 
        dataset_id,
        last_updated,
        CASE 
          WHEN last_updated > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN 'recent'
          WHEN last_updated > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' THEN 'ok'
          ELSE 'stale'
        END as status
      FROM datasets
      WHERE source_type = 'ONS'
        AND deleted_at IS NULL
    `,
    type: 'postgres',
    threshold: null,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Status da ingestão de dados'
  },
  {
    name: 'chat_usage',
    query: `
      SELECT 
        COUNT(*) as total_messages,
        COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as unique_sessions,
        COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as unique_users,
        AVG(CASE WHEN role = 'assistant' 
            THEN LENGTH(content) END) as avg_response_length
      FROM chat_history
      WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
    `,
    type: 'postgres',
    threshold: null,
    critical: false,
    description: 'Uso do chat na última hora'
  }
];

return metrics.map(m => ({json: m}));
